title: Earth Observing-3
text: Earth Observing 3 (EO3) was a proposed joint mission between <a href="NASA">NASA</a> <a href="New%20Millennium%20Program">New Millennium Program</a> and the US Navy's <a href="Office%20of%20Naval%20Research">Office of Naval Research</a>. Geosynchronous Imaging Fourier Transform Spectrometer — Indian Ocean METOC Imager (GIFTS-IOMI) was the instrument selected by NASA to perform as EO3's latest <a href="weather%20satellite">weather satellite</a> observing instrument. The EO3 project ended with the cancellation of NMP in 2008.
